name: Hammer Simulator VR
description:
Dear fellow Jamming Jammers,

 Build targets support WINDOWS MIXED REALITY (WMR) and OCULUS HMD.  

* Require left and right hand controller.

I have really enjoyed taking part in the Jam, and hope you enjoy my submission.

Please also join my fairly new twitch channel which I will start streaming on more regularly!  

Here is a video of me playing it :
https://www.twitch.tv/videos/614863688

https://www.twitch.tv/stuartrules

Thanks for checking out my entry int VRJAM2020!
